author: Bobins Abraham
title: In Some Good News, Two Sr Citizens Aged 91, 88 Recover From Covid-19, Discharged From Hospital
description: The coronavirus (Covid-19) has a mortality rate of just around 2 percent, but the same is much higher for those with underlying health conditions which compromises their immunity and among senior citizens. Across the world, most of those who have succumbed to…
